channel.title: Comments on: Three More SFF Opening Lines and *IF* They’re Intruiging
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Katarina Betterton
item.dc:creator: Katarina Betterton
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/three-more-sff-opening-lines-and-if-theyre-intruiging/#comment-1709">Simon</a>.
I respect that! Glad you liked them!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Simon.

I respect that! Glad you liked them!

I don know - I think it just came alive in my mind :-)
